issue.title: [CF 1314] Incorrect cooldown sweep being shown
issue.body:
Currently having issues where sometimes the cooldown sweep is entirely inaccurate

https://gist.github.com/tmw-issue-import/f5ec07c5d6681114fdb64c47e2a31364


> Posted by CurseForge user srobins6 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1314 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: 2016-10-11__2_.png

2016-10-11__2_.png

<p>The original duration was like 30 seconds so this was wrong</p>


> Posted by CurseForge user srobins6

I have no idea what I'm looking at. Care to be more descriptive?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

It's very difficult to describe, I was trying to update to the most recent version to get a better screenshot but now I'm getting this error:
